title: Older immigrants living in US more satisfied with life than native-born counterparts

title_detail.value: Older immigrants living in US more satisfied with life than native-born counterparts

summary: Most people who immigrated to the United States for a chance to live the 'American Dream' are more satisfied with their lives in the 'land of the free' than those who were born here, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Most people who immigrated to the United States for a chance to live the 'American Dream' are more satisfied with their lives in the 'land of the free' than those who were born here, according to new research.
